projectDescription: This is a restaurant website.I mainly focused on the front-end part as I am a front-end developer right now. I am continuously working on this project to implement the best features that I can. My main goal for this project is to create a full-stack application using the MERN stack and to develop reusable components to use multiple times throughout the website.

This is a tools-related simple landing page. I mainly focused on the front-end part as I am a front-end developer right now. I am continuously working on this project to implement the best features that I can. My main goal for this project is to create a full-stack application using the MERN stack and to develop reusable components to use multiple times throughout the website.

This is my personal portfolio website, where I showcase my work and demonstrate my expertise in front-end development. As a dedicated front-end developer, I am committed to staying abreast of industry trends and continuously learning new technologies. By embracing best practices such as creating reusable components and maintaining clean code, I strive to deliver high-quality projects. Currently, I am focused on expanding my skill set to encompass full-stack development using the MERN stack. I approach each project with enthusiasm and a drive to refine my abilities, ensuring that my work remains innovative and competitive in today's dynamic tech landscape.
